name: Taşınabilir Otomatik Testere
description: Bugünlerde nadir bulunan eski tip bir otomatik testere. Zamanında pek çok işçinin sık kullandığı bir kesici aletti.
bonus: Kuşanan karakter iyileştiğinde veya bir karakteri iyileştirdiğinde 30 saniye süren bir Metanet Sembolü elde eder ve en fazla 3 Sembole sahip olabilir. Element Becerisi veya Patlaması kullandığında tüm Semboller harcanır ve 10 saniyeliğine Heyecan etkisi kazanır. Harcadığı her bir Sembol için 40/50/60/70/80 Element Ustalığı elde eder ve etki tetiklendikten 2 saniye sonra harcanan her bir Sembol için karaktere 2/2,5/3/3,5/4 Enerji yeniler. Heyecan etkisi her 15 saniyede bir tetiklenebilir ve Semboller, karakter savaş alanında olmasa da elde edilebilir.

refinements.desc: เมื่อได้รับการรักษาหรือทำการรักษา จะได้รับสัญลักษณ์ Stoic หนึ่งอัน เป็นเวลา 30 วินาที โดยสามารถมีสัญลักษณ์ Stoic ได้สูงสุด 3 อัน เมื่อปล่อยสกิลธาตุหรือท่าไม้ตาย จะใช้สัญลักษณ์ Stoic ทั้งหมด เพื่อสร้างเอฟเฟกต์ "Roused" เป็นเวลา 10 วินาที: สัญลักษณ์ Stoic แต่ละอันที่ใช้ไปจะเพิ่มความชำนาญธาตุขึ้น 40 หน่วย และหลังจากที่เกิดเอฟเฟกต์ 2 วินาที สัญลักษณ์ Stoic แต่ละอันที่ใช้ไปจะฟื้นฟูพลังงานธาตุ 2 หน่วย ให้กับผู้สวมใส่ เอฟเฟกต์ Roused สามารถเกิดขึ้นได้มากสุดหนึ่งครั้ง ในทุก 15 วินาที เมื่อตัวละครอยู่ในทีมแต่ไม่ได้เข้าร่วมการต่อสู้ จะยังสามารถรับสัญลักษณ์ Stoic ได้

เมื่อได้รับการรักษาหรือทำการรักษา จะได้รับสัญลักษณ์ Stoic หนึ่งอัน เป็นเวลา 30 วินาที โดยสามารถมีสัญลักษณ์ Stoic ได้สูงสุด 3 อัน เมื่อปล่อยสกิลธาตุหรือท่าไม้ตาย จะใช้สัญลักษณ์ Stoic ทั้งหมด เพื่อสร้างเอฟเฟกต์ "Roused" เป็นเวลา 10 วินาที: สัญลักษณ์ Stoic แต่ละอันที่ใช้ไปจะเพิ่มความชำนาญธาตุขึ้น 50 หน่วย และหลังจากที่เกิดเอฟเฟกต์ 2 วินาที สัญลักษณ์ Stoic แต่ละอันที่ใช้ไปจะฟื้นฟูพลังงานธาตุ 2.5 หน่วย ให้กับผู้สวมใส่ เอฟเฟกต์ Roused สามารถเกิดขึ้นได้มากสุดหนึ่งครั้ง ในทุก 15 วินาที เมื่อตัวละครอยู่ในทีมแต่ไม่ได้เข้าร่วมการต่อสู้ จะยังสามารถรับสัญลักษณ์ Stoic ได้

Kuşanan karakter iyileştiğinde veya bir karakteri iyileştirdiğinde 30 saniye süren bir Metanet Sembolü elde eder ve en fazla 3 Sembole sahip olabilir. Element Becerisi veya Patlaması kullandığında tüm Semboller harcanır ve 10 saniyeliğine Heyecan etkisi kazanır. Harcadığı her bir Sembol için 40 Element Ustalığı elde eder ve etki tetiklendikten 2 saniye sonra harcanan her bir Sembol için karaktere 2 Enerji yeniler. Heyecan etkisi her 15 saniyede bir tetiklenebilir ve Semboller, karakter savaş alanında olmasa da elde edilebilir.

Kuşanan karakter iyileştiğinde veya bir karakteri iyileştirdiğinde 30 saniye süren bir Metanet Sembolü elde eder ve en fazla 3 Sembole sahip olabilir. Element Becerisi veya Patlaması kullandığında tüm Semboller harcanır ve 10 saniyeliğine Heyecan etkisi kazanır. Harcadığı her bir Sembol için 50 Element Ustalığı elde eder ve etki tetiklendikten 2 saniye sonra harcanan her bir Sembol için karaktere 2,5 Enerji yeniler. Heyecan etkisi her 15 saniyede bir tetiklenebilir ve Semboller, karakter savaş alanında olmasa da elde edilebilir.

Element Becerisi veya Patlaması kullandığında tüm Semboller harcanır ve 10 saniyeliğine Heyecan etkisi kazanır. Harcadığı her bir Sembol için 60 Element Ustalığı elde eder ve etki tetiklendikten 2 saniye sonra harcanan her bir Sembol için karaktere 3 Enerji yeniler. Heyecan etkisi her 15 saniyede bir tetiklenebilir ve Semboller, karakter savaş alanında olmasa da elde edilebilir.

Kuşanan karakter iyileştiğinde veya bir karakteri iyileştirdiğinde 30 saniye süren bir Metanet Sembolü elde eder ve en fazla 3 Sembole sahip olabilir. Element Becerisi veya Patlaması kullandığında tüm Semboller harcanır ve 10 saniyeliğine Heyecan etkisi kazanır. Harcadığı her bir Sembol için 70 Element Ustalığı elde eder ve etki tetiklendikten 2 saniye sonra harcanan her bir Sembol için karaktere 3,5 Enerji yeniler. Heyecan etkisi her 15 saniyede bir tetiklenebilir ve Semboller, karakter savaş alanında olmasa da elde edilebilir.

Kuşanan karakter iyileştiğinde veya bir karakteri iyileştirdiğinde 30 saniye süren bir Metanet Sembolü elde eder ve en fazla 3 Sembole sahip olabilir. Element Becerisi veya Patlaması kullandığında tüm Semboller harcanır ve 10 saniyeliğine Heyecan etkisi kazanır. Harcadığı her bir Sembol için 80 Element Ustalığı elde eder ve etki tetiklendikten 2 saniye sonra harcanan her bir Sembol için karaktere 4 Enerji yeniler. Heyecan etkisi her 15 saniyede bir tetiklenebilir ve Semboller, karakter savaş alanında olmasa da elde edilebilir.
